Posts.Content: 2.5 cm solid breast mass. Core needle biopsy showed benign breast tissue. Is that sufficient diagnosis or should it specify what type (ie. fibroadenima)? Dr wants to do another biopsy in 6 weeks. Does that mean it was really inconclusive?
Posts.Title: Core needle biopsy pathology
Is ultrasound of axillary lymph node normal?
Is ultrasound of axillary lymph node normal?

Posts.Content: I am 40, and my mammogram showed a 2.5cm nodule so I was sent for ultrasound. Before the technician scanned the nodule she spent quite a while taking measurements in the area where my axillary lymph node would be. Is that protocol or did the mammogram show a problem there as well. No one would tell me anything and I don't meet with the surgeon for another week and a half. They just said it is a 2.5 cm solid nodule. Thanks for any input!
Posts.Title: Is ultrasound of axillary lymph node normal?
